org.jcatapult.guice
Class GuiceContainer

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.guice.GuiceContainer

public class GuiceContainer
extends Object

This class is a singleton that allows Guice to be configured by JCatapult and then used in places like Struts or anywhere else in the container. This should be one of the only places that is a singleton in the entire JCatapult system and within any application since it allows for classes to be injected after construction (like JSP tag libraries) and the like.

GuiceContainer

public GuiceContainer()
Method Detail

getInjector

public static com.google.inject.Injector getInjector()
Returns:
Retrieves the injector that is setup via the initialize() method.

setGuiceModulesNames

public static void setGuiceModulesNames(String guiceModules)
The comma separated list of guice modules to use if guice is being setup by the filter. This is controlled by the jcatapult configuration property named jcatapult.guice.modules.

Parameters:
guiceModules - A comma separated list of guice modules to use.

setGuiceModules

public static void setGuiceModules(com.google.inject.Module... guiceModules)
The list of guice modules to use if guice is being setup by the filter.

Parameters:
guiceModules - A list of guice modules to use.

setExcludeGuiceModules

public static void setExcludeGuiceModules(String guiceExcludeModules)
The comma separated list of guice modules to exclude if the GuiceContainer is configured to search the classpath for modules and implement the leaf node convention. This is controlled by the JCatapult configuration property named jcatapult.guice.exclude.modules.

Parameters:
guiceExcludeModules - A comma separated list of guice modules to exclude.

setLoadFromClasspath

public static void setLoadFromClasspath(boolean loadFromClasspath)
The flag that determines if Guice should search the classpath for modules and implement the leaf node convention of finding and creating modules for the injector. This is controlled by the JCatapult configuration property named jcatapult.guice.load.from.classpath.

Parameters:
loadFromClasspath - A flag that determines the mode for the Container.

initialize

public static final void initialize()
Please do not invoke this method unless you know what you are doing. This initializes Guice and does it once only so that synchronization is not used. This is called by the JCatapultFilter in its constructor and should cover all cases.

inject

public static final void inject()
This method should normally be called prior to the initialize method in order to inject the configuration values from the jcatapult.properties file into this class. This is however not required if you prefer to setup things using another mechanism or by hand. The only thing you must do is to set the correct configuration using the various static setter methods prior to invoking the initialize() method.
